name: Blockon
description:
Hi, looking for some puzzle today?

From super-easy to mind-challenging (hopefully), Blockon presents 60 levels and 180 challenges to you!

The blocks are waiting for you. Are you ready?

[Goal]

Your goal in this game is to create a path between the starting (yellow) block and the finishing (white) block.

There are various blocks, each with its own mechanism.

[Control]

The game is playable by mouse or touch.

The game also supports keyboard in the main gameplay, but not in menus yet.

[Button/Swiping/Arrows or WASD]: Move the blocks
[Button/Enter or Space]: Connect the path if it exists

[Credits]

Special thanks to Ceci C. and Joe Z. for being the playtesters of this game.

[About me]

Hello.

I am a self-proclaimed professional procrastinator who finally published a game :D.
